summary: Anna visits her writer sister Erica and her cop husband Patrik in Fjällbacka. Anna dates a TV host filming in town. A woman's found unconscious, OD'd on insulin. Then a man's murdered. Patrik and Erica investigate.
cast: Claudia Galli|Richard Ulfsäter|Ellen Stenman Göransson|Pamela Cortes Bruna|Lennart Jähkel|Ann Westin|Simon Brodén|Lukas Brodén|Sofia Zouagui|Per Morberg|Philomène Grandin|Christoffer Nordenrot|Marie Delleskog|Johan Hedenberg|Anki Lidén|Karin Bergquist|Monica Nielsen|Emma Swenninger|Matias Varela|Jenny Hurtigh|Jonas Rimeika|Louise Rehnquist|Christian Johansson|David Levi|Måns Ellmark
keywords: place name in title|part of series|based on character from novel
title: Los crímenes de Fjällbacka: Según el cristal con que se mire
